main event: An unidentified round orange light was observed in Neustadt, Germany on 4 August 1954.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 35 minutes.,The object displayed a round, orange, straight, and circular light pattern.,The object appeared to rise at angles between 15-60 degrees and then moved 180 degrees during the final observations.,The sighting was confirmed by one witness, a housewife who was unable to sleep.,The sky was clear and cloudless during the observation.
sighted object: a round orange light in the sky
